author: markt
msg: - Fix bugs 13960, 13961. Edit javadoc comments to prevent warnings during compile. A minor issue but enables a couple of bugs to be closed.
- Also took the opportunity to remove any unused imports reported by Eclipse.

author: luehe
msg: (for TLD scanning purposes) JARs (in the classloader delegation chain)
that are known not to contain any TLDs.

author: luehe
msg: Convert selected tag attribute types to their Fully-Qualified-Name
equivalents if the taglib is JSP 1.2 based.
This has been discussed with Mark Roth, the JSP spec lead, and will
allow JSP 1.2 taglibs to continue to work on Tomcat 5. Notice that JSP
1.2 did not require that tag attribute types be specified using their
fully-qualified class names. This restriction was added in Tomcat 5.
